extendedInfo.description: How fast can you find 5 differences between 2 photos?The Find Differences game has lots of beautiful high definition photos. You just need to find the 5 differences between two beautiful pictures which look almost the same. If you are in trouble, Find Differences will give you 5 Tips, that can help you continue.* The Find Differences game is completely free.* The Find Differences puzzle works in offline mode. (No internet connection is required)* The Find Differences has a resume feature. You can stop the game anytime you want. It will save your current score and will give you the option to resume it.* The Find Differences puzzle uses the hardware acceleration of the device.
